languages.text: "На Тассере найден слишком опасный варп-активный минерал. Во благо Империума я распорядил{mf|ся|ась} уничтожить его. Даю вам время вывезти имущество Администратума, после чего планета приговаривается к экстерминатусу".

"An exceedingly hazardous warp-active mineral was discovered on Thassera. For the good of the Imperium, I ordered it be destroyed. I am giving you time to evacuate Administratum property, after which, the planet will be condemned to Exterminatus."
languages.original_text: "На Тассере найден слишком опасный варп-активный минерал. Во благо Империума я распорядил{mf|ся|ась} уничтожить его. Даю вам время вывезти имущество Администратума, после чего планета приговаривается к экстерминатусу".

traits.locale_text: "An exceedingly hazardous warp-active material was discovered on Thassera. For the good of the Imperium, I ordered it be destroyed. I am giving you time to evacuate Administratum property, after which the planet will be condemned to an Exterminatus."
"A unique mineral was discovered on Thassera; however, it turned out to be warp-active and likely dangerous. For the good of the Imperium, I ordered that it be destroyed."

"An exceedingly hazardous warp-active material was discovered on Thassera. For the good of the Imperium, I ordered it be destroyed. I am giving you time to evacuate Administratum property, after which, the planet will be condemned to an Exterminatus."

"An exceedingly hazardous warp-active material was discovered on Thassera. For the good of the Imperium, I ordered it be destroyed. I am giving you time to evacuate Administratum property, after which, the planet will be condemned to an Exterminatus."

"An exceedingly hazardous warp-active mineral was discovered on Thassera. For the good of the Imperium, I ordered it be destroyed. I am giving you time to evacuate Administratum property, after which, the planet will be condemned to Exterminatus."

"An exceedingly hazardous warp-active mineral was discovered on Thassera. For the good of the Imperium, I ordered it be destroyed. I am giving you time to evacuate Administratum property, after which, the planet will be condemned to Exterminatus."

"An exceedingly hazardous warp-active material was discovered on Thassera. For the good of the Imperium, I ordered it be destroyed. I am giving you time to evacuate Administratum property, after which the planet will be condemned to an Exterminatus."

languages.text: 「タッセーラで極めて危険な〈歪み〉活性鉱物が発見された。帝国の利益のために、それを破壊するよう命じた。今は、帝国行政局の資産を退避させるための時間を与えている。それが終わり次第、この惑星は〈究極浄化〉の対象とする」
languages.original_text: "An exceedingly hazardous warp-active mineral was discovered on Thassera. For the good of the Imperium, I ordered it be destroyed. I am giving you time to evacuate Administratum property, after which, the planet will be condemned to Exterminatus."

traits.locale_text: 「タッセーラで極めて危険な〈歪み〉活性鉱物が発見された。帝国の利益のために、それを破壊するよう命じた。今は、帝国行政局の資産を退避させるための時間を与えている。それが終わり次第、この惑星は〈究極浄化〉の対象とする」

languages.text: "Ein überaus gefährliches, Warp-aktives Mineral wurde auf Thassera entdeckt. Für das Wohl des Imperiums habe ich seine Zerstörung angeordnet. Ich gebe Euch Zeit, das Administratum zu evakuieren. Danach wird der Planet zu Exterminatus verdammt."
languages.original_text: "An exceedingly hazardous warp-active mineral was discovered on Thassera. For the good of the Imperium, I ordered it be destroyed. I am giving you time to evacuate Administratum property, after which, the planet will be condemned to Exterminatus."

traits.locale_text: "Ein überaus gefährliches, Warp-aktives Mineral wurde auf Thassera entdeckt. Für das Wohl des Imperiums habe ich seine Zerstörung angeordnet. Ich gebe Euch Zeit, das Administratum zu evakuieren. Danach wird der Planet zu Exterminatus verdammt."

languages.text: « Un minerai sensible au Warp et incroyablement dangereux a été découvert sur Thassera. Dans l'intérêt de l'Imperium, j'ai ordonné sa destruction. Je vous laisse le temps d'évacuer la propriété de l'Administratum, après quoi la planète sera condamnée à l'Exterminatus. »
languages.original_text: "An exceedingly hazardous warp-active mineral was discovered on Thassera. For the good of the Imperium, I ordered it be destroyed. I am giving you time to evacuate Administratum property, after which, the planet will be condemned to Exterminatus."

traits.locale_text: « Un minerai sensible au Warp et incroyablement dangereux a été découvert sur Thassera. Dans l'intérêt de l'Imperium, j'ai ordonné sa destruction. Je vous laisse le temps d'évacuer la propriété de l'Administratum, après quoi la planète sera condamnée à l'Exterminatus. »

languages.text: «Descubrimos un mineral con propiedades disformes extremadamente peligrosas en Thassera. Ordené su destrucción por el bien del Imperium. Les concederé un tiempo prudencial para evacuar las propiedades del Administratum; después, el planeta será sentenciado al Exterminatus».
languages.original_text: "An exceedingly hazardous warp-active mineral was discovered on Thassera. For the good of the Imperium, I ordered it be destroyed. I am giving you time to evacuate Administratum property, after which, the planet will be condemned to Exterminatus."

traits.locale_text: «Descubrimos un mineral con propiedades disformes extremadamente peligrosas en Thassera. Ordené su destrucción por el bien del Imperium. Les concederé un tiempo prudencial para evacuar las propiedades del Administratum; después, el planeta será sentenciado al Exterminatus».

languages.text: “我们在塔瑟拉发现了某种拥有亚空间活性的矿物，极其危险。为了帝国的利益，我下令将其彻底销毁。我给你一定时间撤离那颗行星的内政部资产。等撤离结束之后，我就会对塔瑟拉签发灭绝令。”
languages.original_text: "An exceedingly hazardous warp-active mineral was discovered on Thassera. For the good of the Imperium, I ordered it be destroyed. I am giving you time to evacuate Administratum property, after which, the planet will be condemned to Exterminatus."

traits.locale_text: “我们在塔瑟拉发现了某种拥有亚空间活性的矿物，极其危险。为了帝国的利益，我下令将其彻底销毁。我给你一定时间撤离那颗行星的内政部资产。等撤离结束之后，我就会对塔瑟拉签发灭绝令。”

languages.text: "Thassera'da öteboyuta duyarlı bir maden keşfedildi. İmparatorluk'un iyiliği için bu madenin yok edilmesini emrediyorum. Administratum'un mülkünün boşaltılması için zaman tanıyorum. Ardından gezegen, Eksterminatus'a mahkûm edilecek."
languages.original_text: "An exceedingly hazardous warp-active mineral was discovered on Thassera. For the good of the Imperium, I ordered it be destroyed. I am giving you time to evacuate Administratum property, after which, the planet will be condemned to Exterminatus."

traits.locale_text: "Thassera'da öteboyuta duyarlı bir maden keşfedildi. İmparatorluk'un iyiliği için bu madenin yok edilmesini emrediyorum. Administratum'un mülkünün boşaltılması için zaman tanıyorum. Ardından gezegen, Eksterminatus'a mahkûm edilecek."
